caller_intent: Miss Taylor is seeking insurance quotes and clarification on auto and home policy details, including rates, deductibles, and coverage options.
resolution_steps: Agent provided auto insurance options with $165/month for 12 months, 100/300 liability limits, and current deductibles.
Discussed adjusting deductibles to $0/$500 for windshield coverage and added towing/rental coverage.
Noted client's daily commute (>10 miles) and 2-point history affecting rates.
Mentioned home insurance quote pending verification of home construction year (1995).
Admitted missing a quote from Northwest Farmers and scheduled follow-up for next day.
Clarified timeline for 2 points expiring (March 2027, 3 years from conviction date in September 2024).
summary: Agent provided auto insurance quotes with specific rates and coverage options, discussed deductible adjustments, and scheduled a follow-up for a missing home insurance quote. Client was informed about point expiration timelines and coverage details. Call concluded with agreement to check back the next day.
